text: That was the first point that Mr. Hammarskjold made. India has responded handsomely by providing 3,000 men, who must take about a fortnight to arrive. If the UN forces were thick enough on the ground, such incidents as that at Matadi would not happen. THE UN's ability to keep peace depends simply on adequate support by the nations which have set their hands to this plough.
handwritten_text: That was the first point that Mr. Hammarskjold made. India has responded handsomely by providing 3,000 men, who must take about a fortnight to arrive. THE UN's ability to keep peace depends simply on adequate support by the nations which have set their hands to this plough.
